title: Enhancing Medical Practical Competencies: Analyzing the Role and Contributions of Instructional Designers in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of mathematics and comprehension of medical education systems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three core roles of instructional designers in medical education environments.
Learners can assess instructional designers’ job performance using surveys and quantitative/qualitative analysis methods.
Learners can compare the roles of instructional designers across different institutional types (universities, consulting firms, etc.) and propose optimal staffing strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
